title: Gift the golf lover in your life the Phigolf simulator, now under $200
content:
Macworld

Don’t look now, but the holidays are less than ten weeks away. Have you started your shopping list yet? If not, there’s no time like the present. If you know someone who wants to golf all year long or want to treat yourself, the Phigolf World Tour Edition is now only $199.99 (reg. $249) and would make a perfect gift!

With the Phigolf, you don’t need to wait for spring to hit the links. The Phigolf simulator app allows you to golf anytime and anywhere from the comfort of home. Just download the Phigolf app on your mobile device, mirror it to your TV, and start playing.

You can play on over 38,000 actual golf courses, which are realistically (though virtually) rendered, and gain the upper hand on your golf buddies. Plus, the included 9-axis motion sensor (Bluetooth compatible with the Phigolf app), attachable to the end of your golf club or the end of a training stick (included), can help you improve your game. You’ll receive live 3D analysis on your swinging, chipping, driving, and putting!

Improve your golf game all year long with this home simulator, or get ahead of holiday shopping for the golf lover in your life.

Get the Phigolf World Tour Edition with a sensor and swing trainer club for just $199.99.
